overview_of_class: This course covers supply, demand, price controls, taxes and subsidies; consumer choice and demand; production, costs, and supply; perfect competition, equity, and efficiency; economic models, optimization, and equilibrium.
name: Microeconomics
title: SCS ECON 310-A-16 Microeconomics

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: This course covers supply, demand, price controls, taxes and subsidies; consumer choice and demand; production, costs, and supply; perfect competition, equity, and efficiency; economic models, optimization, and equilibrium.

subject: ECON
